item.title: Projects
item.description:
GAMES

Salvager (2023)

Salvager was my Capstone project at Full Sail Univerity where I developed Custom Engine Technology and Tooling to implement a simple ARPG game as a solo developer over the couse of 4 months. Most of the technology used was developed from scratch excluding the use of FBX SDK to import mesh assets and Nuklear to handle User Interfaces.
